text: - As an AWS customer

you benefit from preconfigured
automatic protection

against common network and
transport layer attacks such

as UDP floods. For stronger
customized protection
against targeted DDoS attacks
you can subscribe to AWS Shield Advanced.

Shield Advanced gives
you tailored protection
using an exabyte-scale detection platform

that aggregates data across
AWS to identify threats.
It creates a baseline of your applications
normal traffic patterns
and monitors for availability threats.

When an availability
risk is detected Shield
Advanced automatically deploys network

and application layer mitigations
such as rate limiting,

dropping traffic or using
advanced routing techniques.

Shield Advanced provides
alerting via Amazon CloudWatch.

And you can call on the
shield response team to

help you mitigate more
complex DDoS attacks

at any time. Easily configure
web application protection

with AWS WAF and centrally
manage security policies

with AWS Firewall Manager,
which are included

at no additional cost. Shield
Advanced offers reporting
through the management console
and APIs, and cost protections
safeguarding you against charges resulting
from DDoS related usage spikes.

Strengthen your application
availability today
and get started with AWS Shield Advanced.
